trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There were 2 other sightings in Wilmington on or around June 7th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI managed to photograph this object today in a clear blue sky with no other aircraft, clouds or anything else visible. Occasionally I can see it with the naked eye but it appears and disappears quickly. Only once in the past 2 years have I been able to be quick enough to photograph it while actually viewing it through the viewfinder. One other time it stayed visible about 8 months ago long enough for me to catch it in front of a plane and then behind the plane before it disappeared. I had the plane and the object in the same photo so there is no mistaking the object being the same object. I have all these old photos saved if case anyone would be interested. I am enclosing the original and one enlargement.
